system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: The user's gains +1 ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD for 5 activations.

Requirement: [Kommo-o] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and either Clanging Scales or Clangorous Soul on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Clangorous Soulblaze

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
